title: Readability Metrics
description:
This API can be used to compute a set of readability metrics for a given text. We currently support the following metrics: Automated Readability Index, Coleman-Liau Index, Fleschâ€“Kincaid Grade Level, Flesch Reading Ease, Gunning-Fog Index, SMOG score, and SMOG Index.

The service is deployed at Google App Engine and available at http://ipeirotis.appspot.com/readability/

The code and documentation are available on Github at https://github.com/ipeirotis/ReadabilityMetrics
